website_summaries.verdict: This contact solution is trusted and recommended by eye doctors, paying tribute to just how effective it is.
pros: Purchase includes 2-pack and free lens case
Keeps contacts clean and comfortable and helps eyes retain moisture while wearing contacts
Gentle enough for everyday use while still remaining highly effective
cons: Contains the preservative Aldox, which some people may have sensitivities to

customer_reviews.title: To OPTI-FREE Puremoist Users
customer_reviews.text: If you like OPTI-FREE Puremoist line as much as I do, don't try this one. I have used puremoist for years and I have no problem with it. However, I decided to try a new line and bought this one last month, OMG it dried my eyes so bad. I can't even believe they are just different lines of the same brand. Thanks to Amzon refund policy, I returned and Amazon refunded me.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Have been using Opti-Free products for over 20 years now ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Opti-Free products for over 20 years now and is the only brand i have no allergic reaction to. That being said this product does contain Aldox as a preservative which some people may have allergic reactions to. Thimerosal is used as a preservative by other companies and can also cause allergic reactions such as 'burning' or 'stinging' of the eyes. Thimerosal is a mercury-containing organic compound (an organomercurial) and was at one time used in flu shots as a preservative but do to allergic reactions has been weened out of most vaccinations. Check the label provided by the manufacturer to see which preservative is being used as this can greatly reduce the chances of allergic reactions.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for most people
customer_reviews.text: SO I haven't been able to wear contacts in years but my optometrist gave me a sample of another brand and it worked for me! I was unable to use this myself but my roommate is only able to use this brand... After talking to my optometrist he says they usually recommend this optifree because it works best with most contacts and people so apparently i'm just the odd one out! Haha. But it works great for the roommate- he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain ManTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fresh eyes all day!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand of contact solution. My husband and I both wear contacts. We go through some solution and I feel like we’ve tried every brand out there. Opti-free solution makes my contacts feel moisturized all day and I forget I’m wearing them. Other brands will make my contacts feel okay for a while but then I’m tearig at my eyes by the end of the day to get them out of my eyes because they are so dry. I’ve noticed that my contacts actually last longer with Opti-Free too. Maybe it’s just me, but I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Need rewetting drops because this didn't replenish the optimal hydration.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this because it popped up at the top of the list....I switched to pure moist now though because this stuff made me conscious of the contacts being there, felt like I had a lash in my eye or something....Pure moist is now my go to....This was okay but I didn't feel it hydrated the lenses, or lubricated them enough to make them comfortable....2 stars because it seemed to do the disinfecting and somewhat "replenish" the moisture content....But I had to use rewetting drops with this once the contacts were in so to me that's worth 2 out of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: myreviews30

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: These are not true opti-free. I bought these assuming it would save me a trip to the store however the bottles are clearly the wrong size. Compared to the store bought ones that claim to be the same volume, this was clearly smaller and did not have the logo imprinted on the bottle. I had to use it since I had no other option but I felt cheated. Do not buy this product - please do yourself a favor and buy the real product anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Been getting red eyes from using this!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this before and had no problems but recently been using renu and switched over to Optifree. Suddenly I've been getting red eyes at night but no pain or itching, so mainly its been drying my eyes or I have an abnormal reaction to them. Be wary if you get red eyes and test with another product to see if its the solution
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% Saline?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I got unlucky, but both my solutions have been having odd effects on my contacts. After storing my contacts overnight in either of the bottle solutions, my brand new contacts will always crinkle and lose shape. I've tried several different clean cases with the same effect. Using a generic product saline worked fine, something is off with the batch I received.
customer_reviews.author: Senor Esteban

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended this brand because others leave a film over my contacts that cause vision to appear blurry. I wasn't able to find this brand in stores and had to order it online. My contacts were much clearer after using this solution. I have to wait and see how it works with brand new contacts that haven't been previously cleaned in Alcon Opti-Free puremoist solution prior to receiving the Alcon Opti-Free Replenish solution. Other solutions have a chemical that leaves a layer of film thus, making vision blurry. So far so good with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Stefawnee

customer_reviews.title: Finally no more dry eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how well this solution works for dry eyes. I had to stop wearing my contacts because I couldn't get through one day with them due to dry eyes. It was so bad I had to see the doctor. Even the prescription drops he gave me didn't work as well as this solution. I'm on my second bottle and have not had one problem since I started using it. I've come to rely more on Amazon's reviews from real people than the manufacturer's claims and I'm so grateful to all the reviewers who pointed out how helpful this is for dry eyes. Add me to the list!
customer_reviews.author: Reademandweep

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE OPTI FREE REPLENISH!
customer_reviews.text: I just came back from the eye doctor and found out that the reason my eyes have been so sensitive and itchy lately is because I have inflamed corneas from using optifree replenish. Especially if you use acuvue Oasis contacts, this solution is horrible. The preservative in it causs to irritation of the eyes. Seriously, save yourself the money, time, and pain and use any other contact solution out there. It's awful that this horrible product is still allowed to be sold.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Howk

customer_reviews.title: So glad this has worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm wary of wearing contacts because my experience hasn't been the best. Usually, my eyes get irritated and uncomfortable at some point and become really red. I decided I wanted to wear contacts again, but I needed contact solution. Tried it, and my eyes were fine. For once it was comfortable. I've tried the moisturizing one for this brand and bio true, same irritating results. I was even recommended to use eye drops by the eye doctor and that made it worse. I've worn my contacts about 3 times so far this week, and it's been fine so that makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousPerson

customer_reviews.title: Made wearing contacts a breeze
customer_reviews.text: I'm a new contact wearer wand was having issues with discomfort from my lenses. I decided to switch to this solution and it helped tremendously. No more discomfort! Some people say the bottles are smaller than what you get in stores unfortunately I have no idea as I've been unable to find in a physical store near me. But they are the size and weight as advertised so that's all that matters to me!
customer_reviews.author: Zero33

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't bother my eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have used this solution since I got contacts. For a few years, I tried out some new solutions: a Great Valu bottle and a ReNu bottle. The great valu wasn't as bad, but the ReNu bottle stung my eyes terribly and I couldn't use it. My brother had the same issue. This Opti-Free Replenish has always been pain-free and keeps my 2-week contacts in great condition, even for a couple extra weeks. I will not ever buy a different brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Terah

customer_reviews.title: Works well, if you don't need a solution that adds extra moisture, that lasts.
customer_reviews.text: This solution worked well. I have no complaints. However, my lenses get dry, so I prefer the optifree puremoist solution. Puremoist seems to feel more comfortable, and feels moisturized longer. Although, if you don't have a problem with dry lenses, this solution may work well for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn S

customer_reviews.title: Eye Doctor directed me to stop using product
customer_reviews.text: My eye doctor directed me to stop using this product due to documented cases of causing contracts to become blurry. I had used this for years but will follow my eye doctors recommendation. He reccomended RevitaLens by accuvue.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Love Opti-Free!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried just about every brand of solution on the market. Opti-Free does exactly what it says it does. My contacts stay hydrated all day. If for some reason my eyes do get dry, which is rare, their eye drops work great. My contacts stay soft and glide on my eye comfortably. This is a brand I swear by!
customer_reviews.author: KrystalTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Can someone explain to me how these two 10 oz bottles holding the same amount of liquid?
customer_reviews.text: Can someone explain to me how these two 10 oz bottles holding the same amount of liquid? I've been buying this for a while and i feel i've been robbed on the last order. At about $8 a bottle this stuff isn't that cheap. The new bottle is skinny and claims to hold the same "10 oz" of liquid. short of wasting a bottle and measuring this in another container, i just don't see how that's possible.
customer_reviews.author: SG1111

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, use time and time again! Never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: Honest review here. This multi-use disinfectant is great for contacts. I have been using contacts for years and this is the only solution I will buy. Usually can find it on here for a competitive price. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: baby momma knows

customer_reviews.title: 36 years wearing contacts, many brands, this is the best, for me.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing contact lenses for 36 years. This has been the best out of many, many brands, some adverse reactions for me. I used the generic brands for this for years, but one time I bought the real deal again and WOW! I was so mad at myself! So many years I was missing out on comfort!!!! Don’t go generic. I do not like their Pure Moist, it has too much of something and interferes with my vision and it’s like I feel like I put a drop oil in my eyes. I returned that immediate years back when I tried it.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Irritatation and dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: I wear Acuvue Oasys 2 week lenses and these leave my eyes irritated and dry. Sucks too because I bought these a month ago and just ran out of my PureMoist and now regret buying this so early. Ive also had the same issues with CVS generic brand and Baush and Lamb brand.
customer_reviews.author: John Kim

customer_reviews.title: Too close expiration date
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit this one was not great. I always get the comfort ones but I thought to give replenish a try but it just does give me the lasting comfort and it drys out fast. Not to mention the expiration date was far too close. Couldn’t get through one bottle.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it, good price
customer_reviews.text: At Meijer you pay $12.99 for one bottle, so the value is there with this purchase. I wear my contacts daily and it's been about two months since I ordered this. Still only like halfway through the first bottle. I'll order again because I'm satisfied with getting two for the price of one.

customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years because it is comfortable and reccomended by my eye doctor. I normally buy this in my pharmacy but because of covid19 i didnt want to leave my house to buy it. Great product!

customer_reviews.title: Apparently its not a no-rub solution anymore?
customer_reviews.text: I use Opti-free all the time but Im starting to notice that its slowly moving from a no-rub to a rub solution but the price is staying the same. I'm going to give it another try because I haven't had a problem but Ill try a certified no rub and compare the 2. I think it works fine but I want to make sure that Im not getting ripped off. I still give it 4 stars because my eyes are not irritated and I feel like my contacts are clean but the fact that its a rub solution now bothers me.

As soon as I switched to Alcon Opti-Free, the styes stopped along with the redness and watering. What a relief!

It doesn’t irritate my eyes and it cleans my contacts every time.

The only bad thing is that I use the solution liberally and you can go through a bottle of these solutions within weeks. The price is also kind of expensive, but overall, it's worth it.

customer_reviews.author: Sarah Russo

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using OPTI-FREE since I got my fist pair of contacts. I've tried other kinda but I always came right back to this. My contacts stay clear and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a long time and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality brand
customer_reviews.text: Still arguably the best contact solution on the market. Keeps the lenses clean and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fontaine

customer_reviews.title: Works Every Time
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this brand of solution for almost 10 years now! I am a loyal customer, and recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Chamblee   Karen Chamblee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for slime
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the use for contacts but Doesn’t work for slime.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Grickis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Opti-free is one of the most comfortable contact solutions I’ve used. But I always seem to forget to pick some up when I’m at the store. Ordering it with my amazon prime account has been awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Very good and dependable
customer_reviews.text: I always go with Opti-Free contact cleansing solution. I have been using their products for years. I see no reason to stop, as I have never been disappointed. Awesome job Opti-Free!
customer_reviews.author: Laura E. McLaughlin

product_meta.title: Opti-Free Replenish Multi-Purpose Disinfecting Solution with Lens Case, 10 Fl Oz Each, Twin Pack
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1Opti-Free Replenish Multi-Purpose Disinfecting Solution is a powerful contact lens solution that is designed for optimal daily cleaning. Opti-Free Replenish solution features top-notch cleaning and disinfecting power, and provides long lasting moisture and comfort for all day use. The exclusive 2D formula containing Polyquad and Aldox helps disinfect and wash away microorganisms that could result in eye infections and irritation. The TearGlyde reconditioning system that works with tears to help create a barrier of comfortable moisture and constant comfort. The TearGlyde reconditioning system applies itself to the lens allowing a thin layer of moisture from the patient’s natural tears to remain on the lens, allowing for a continuous shield of moisture to form between the lens and the eye. Opti-Free Replenish solution will help to remove unwanted debris and particles, keeping contact lenses cleaner and clearer. Opti-Free Replenish solution works with silicon hydrogel and soft contact lenses. For the best results, rinse and rub each side of the lens with solution for 20 seconds. Afterwards, rinse each side of the lens with a steady stream of solution for 10 seconds. Then place the contact lens in the case with the solution for at least 6 hours or overnight. These lenses may be left in the solution and in an unopened case for up to 30 days before having to clean and disinfect again. Opti-Free strives to continue providing patients with the newest and most effective contact lens products on the market for dry and irritated eyes.
feature_bullets: Opti-Free Replenish provides enhanced comfort with top-notch cleaning and disinfecting power
Exclusive formula gets rid of microorganisms that can cause eye infections
TearGlyde reconditioning system works with your tears to create a shield of comfortable moisture
Removes debris and particles to keep your contact lenses cleaner and clearer
For cleaning and disinfecting all Silicone Hydrogel and other Soft Contact Lenses

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
